title: Foreign Direct Investment in Infrastructure Projects: Taxonomy of Political Risk Profiles in Developing Countries
abstract: AbstractPolitical risk is a recognized deterrent to foreign direct investment in infrastructure (FDII) in developing countries. The sensitivity of FDII to political risk is amplified above that of ...
